summary: 15+ years professional experience in every level of project delivery, ranging from early stages of conceptual planning and design, through final permitting, construction, and project close-out. Delivered successful projects in several areas in Greece and established strong relations with various consultants, companies and end-users. Talented in getting projects built, utilizing technical knowledge to embrace design challenges and solves issues.

awards.title: 1st Prize in National Architectural Competition
awards.description: Naval Sea Museum in Farsa Kefalonia

awards.title: 1st PRIZE, Invited Architectural Competition /conception, design and construction supervision
awards.description: Metal roof construction between the two buildings of the private clinic IASO S.A., Maroussi Athens / 1st PRIZE, Invited Architectural Competition /conception, design and construction supervision/ budget  350K Euros.

awards.title: Praise in the Pan-Hellenic Architectural Competition
awards.description: Service Center ETVA Industrial Area SA, Piraeus Bank / Praise in the Pan-Hellenic Architectural Competition/ Preliminary.

projects.title: CONSULTING SERVICES (government agencies / local authorities)
projects.description:
•	Ministry of Interior (2014) Ministerial Decision 27934/2014 (FEK2029/B/07.25.2014) "Modification and completion of our 28492/2009 (931/B) decision on the organization and operation of the OTA playgrounds"
•	Ministry of Interior (2009), Ministerial Decision 28492/2009 (FΕΚ391/Β/18.5.2009) "Determination of the conditions and technical requirements for the construction and operation of playgrounds of Municipalities and Communities, the institutions and the licensing process and control, maintenance service and all other necessary details."
•	Municipality of Filothei - Psychiko (2013) "specialized consulting services for the management of playgrounds and compliance with national and international standards and regulations."

projects.title: PRIVATE BUILDING & INTERIOR DESIGN PORTFOLIO (selected projects)
projects.description:
•	Various residences construction and reconstruction, including residential development in Crete for J&P Development, conception and design/ cost budget 1MEuros.
•	New building shops and offices construction with budget 50K-350KEuros per project.
•	Hotel design and renovations, including partial renovation of the Mykonos Beach Hotel, Megali
Ammos (public areas, lounge, swimming pool)/ preliminary-final design/ cost budget 500K Euros
•	Reinstatements and renovations including: 
o	A medieval castle-house restoration in Olimpoi, Chios/design-supervision, cost budget
100K Euros. 
o	Cosmote centers and infrastructure upgrade.

projects.title: PUBLIC SPACES DESIGN PORTFOLIO (selected projects)
projects.description:
•	Expansion of the National Gallery of Athens, consulting in the Implementation design group.
•	Reinstatements and Renovations:
o	Re-use of the "Warehouse 186" and transformation into Cinema, Municipality of Gargaliani/ conception and Implementation design, project budget 500KEuros
o	functional and energy upgrade of the 17th High School-Municipality of Athens/ design-supervision, strict deadline of two months, project budget 100KEuros, sponsorship of "3E". Delivered on time to the major of Athens.
•	Urban design: 
o	Program plan of Skiathos Port, Prefecture of Magnesia
o	Coastal front regeneration of Elefsina Municipality/Preliminary design
o	Regeneration of Municipality Library Park in Gargaliani/ design-supervision, budget
o	Landscape design with emphasis in playground configurations:
o	Three nature playgrounds within the sponsorship of the company "3E" in Athens, 
Patras and Aigio/design-supervision, 3 months duration, project budget 150KEuros.
o	3 thematic play-parks in the municipality of Filothei-Psychiko/Implementation design,
project budget 1MEuros.

profile_positions.description:
Co-founder/Experienced Project Architect

In charge of the Building Regulations required within the projects design and responsible for the final acceptance of implementation design. Main Duties:     
•	Overall Architectural design process. 
•	Bidding and negotiating. 
•	Extensive construction administration and on site representation.
•	Coordinating and monitoring budgets for the construction projects. 
•	Interpersonal client communication and meetings.
Introduced the playground design as a new business sector of the company. Set up and lead the team by applying needed processes organizing such projects.
profile_positions.title: Project Architect

profile_positions.description:
Architectural design and construction supervision including private housing, commercial spaces, leisure and landscape design, in collaboration with other architects and engineers. General architectural services including building regulations approval, contacts with various experts/partners, building materials suppliers, construction companies and various technical departments of public organizations.

Main references:
•	About 5 bars and restaurants, (‘Stretto’, ‘Alcatraz’, ‘Allector’, ’Melissa’, ‘ Magazi’).
•	More than 3 private residences in all over Greece, including five-storey house building in Koukaki.
•	Office buildings, including MELMAR SA in Kifissia and Filothei.
•	Winery in Koitada Samothrace, FARM MELMAR SA.
•	Pavilion of Shell Gas company for international exhibition Climatherm 2000.
•	More than 3 Clothing stores, (e.g. I&D Colors, Tsakalof street, Kolonaki).
